Package ca.ualberta.cs.c301f13t13.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdapterChapters
    Class which handles taking the Chapter object and adapting it to a displayable view type
    AdapterChoices
    Class which handles taking the Choice object and adapting it to a displayable view type
    AdapterStories
    Class which handles adapting the Story object to a displayable view type
    EditChapterActivity
    Add Chapter Activity Purpose: - To add a chapter to an existing story.
    EditChoiceActivity
    Activity class for adding and editing a choice.
    EditStoryActivity
    Activity for editing the story metadata (title, author, description, and cover image).
    SearchActivity
    Search Activity Allows user to search for a specific story
    SearchResultsActivity
    Search Results activity Displays a list of search results with the parameters given by the user
    ViewBrowseChapters
    Takes a storyID bundle, displays all the chapters related to that story.
    ViewBrowseStories
    Class which displays all stories in a grid, handles different view types.
    ViewChapter
    Views the chapter provided through the intent.
    ViewStory
    Handles viewing the story metadata.
